languages.text: "Ты не просто невежествен{mf||на}. Твои речи надменны и опасны. Не слуга ли ты лжи и обмана? Не приш{mf|ел|ла} ли, чтобы остановить работу священного фильтра?"

traits.locale_text: "Ты не просто невежествен{mf||на}. Твои речи надменны и опасны. Не слуга ли ты ржавчины и скверны? Не приш{mf|ел|ла} ли, чтобы остановить работу священного фильтра?"

languages.text: "You are not just ignorant. Your words are disdainful and dangerous. Could you be a servant of lies and deception? Could you have come to halt the work of the sacred filter?"
languages.original_text: "Ты не просто невежествен{mf||на}. Твои речи надменны и опасны. Не слуга ли ты лжи и обмана? Не приш{mf|ел|ла} ли, чтобы остановить работу священного фильтра?"

traits.locale_text: "You are not just ignorant. Your words are disdainful and dangerous. Could you be a servant of rust and corruption? Could you have come to halt the work of the sacred filter?"
"You are not just ignorant. Your words are disdainful and dangerous. Could you be a servant of rust and corruption? Could you have come to halt the work of the sacred filter?"
"You are not just ignorant. Your words are disdainful and dangerous. Could you be a servant of lies and deception? Could you have come to halt the work of the sacred filter?"
"You are not just ignorant. Your words are disdainful and dangerous. Could you be a servant of lies and deception? Could you have come to halt the work of the sacred filter?"
"You are not just ignorant. Your words are disdainful and dangerous. Could you be a servant of lies and deception? Could you have come to halt the work of the sacred filter?"
"You are not just ignorant. Your words are disdainful and dangerous. Could you be a servant of lies and deception? Could you have come to halt the work of the sacred filter?"

languages.text: “你不仅仅非常无知，你的语气也带着不屑、非常危险。莫非你是谎言与欺骗的仆从吗？莫非你打算阻止神圣的过滤器工作？”
languages.original_text: "You are not just ignorant. Your words are disdainful and dangerous. Could you be a servant of lies and deception? Could you have come to halt the work of the sacred filter?"

traits.locale_text: “你不仅仅非常无知，你的语气也带着不屑、非常危险。莫非你是谎言与欺骗的仆从吗？莫非你打算阻止神圣的过滤器工作？”

languages.text: «No es solo ignorante. Sus palabras son desdeñosas y peligrosas. ¿Acaso está al servicio de las mentiras y el engaño? ¿Viene a detener el trabajo del filtro sagrado?».
languages.original_text: "You are not just ignorant. Your words are disdainful and dangerous. Could you be a servant of lies and deception? Could you have come to halt the work of the sacred filter?"

traits.locale_text: «No es solo ignorante. Sus palabras son desdeñosas y peligrosas. ¿Acaso está al servicio de las mentiras y el engaño? ¿Viene a detener el trabajo del filtro sagrado?».

languages.text: 「ただ無知なだけじゃない。その発言は私達を軽んじて危険を孕んでいる。嘘と誤魔化しに従えと？聖なるフィルターの務めを止めに来たのか？」
languages.original_text: "You are not just ignorant. Your words are disdainful and dangerous. Could you be a servant of lies and deception? Could you have come to halt the work of the sacred filter?"

traits.locale_text: 「ただ無知なだけじゃない。その発言は私達を軽んじて危険を孕んでいる。嘘と誤魔化しに従えと？聖なるフィルターの務めを止めに来たのか？」

languages.text: "Ihr seid nicht bloß ignorant. Eure Worte sind verächtlich und gefährlich. Dient Ihr möglicherweise der Lüge und der Täuschung? Seid Ihr womöglich gekommen, um die Arbeit des heiligen Filters zu unterbinden?"
languages.original_text: "You are not just ignorant. Your words are disdainful and dangerous. Could you be a servant of lies and deception? Could you have come to halt the work of the sacred filter?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid nicht bloß ignorant. Eure Worte sind verächtlich und gefährlich. Dient Ihr möglicherweise der Lüge und der Täuschung? Seid Ihr womöglich gekommen, um die Arbeit des heiligen Filters zu unterbinden?"

languages.text: « Non seulement vous êtes {mf|ignorant|ignorante}, mais votre discours est aussi méprisant que dangereux. Se pourrait-il que vous œuvriez au service du mensonge et de la tromperie ? Chercheriez-vous à empêcher le filtre sacré de faire son travail ? »
languages.original_text: "You are not just ignorant. Your words are disdainful and dangerous. Could you be a servant of lies and deception? Could you have come to halt the work of the sacred filter?"

traits.locale_text: « Non seulement vous êtes {mf|ignorant|ignorante}, mais votre discours est aussi méprisant que dangereux. Se pourrait-il que vous œuvriez au service du mensonge et de la tromperie ? Chercheriez-vous à empêcher le filtre sacré de faire son travail ? »

languages.text: "Yalnızca cahillikle kalmıyorsun, kibirli ve tehlikeli sözler de ediyorsun. Yalan ve düzenbazlığa hizmet mi ediyorsun yoksa? Kutsal filtrenin işleyişine engel olmak için mi buradasın?"
languages.original_text: "You are not just ignorant. Your words are disdainful and dangerous. Could you be a servant of lies and deception? Could you have come to halt the work of the sacred filter?"

traits.locale_text: "Yalnızca cahillikle kalmıyorsun, kibirli ve tehlikeli sözler de ediyorsun. Yalan ve düzenbazlığa hizmet mi ediyorsun yoksa? Kutsal filtrenin işleyişine engel olmak için mi buradasın?"
